extendedInfo.description: NameBuzz is a new concept in Caller ID and SMS ID technology. Silently know who's calling, without your phone leaving your pocket!- Vibrate pattern based on syllables in contact name (default)- Create contact specific vibration patterns- Speak (announce) incoming caller/SMS contact name out loud- Vibrate on call end- Press volume key to silence phone during incoming call- Obeys silent/vibrate only/normal ringer states- Create custom incoming call speech textNOTES:- Tested on Nexus One & HTC Desire Z.- Incompatible with "SMS Popup".- Have GO SMS installed? You need to go to GO SMS -> Settings -> Receive Settings -> Disable other message notification, and untick that box!Caller ID, Vibrate Caller Name, Speak Caller Name, Caller-ID, CallerID, Text Message ID, ringer, say, talk, TTS, speech, text-to-speech, ninja, discreet, vocal, phonology, callend, vibrates, vibration, customise, customize.

reviews.comment: Works great on HTC Incredible....on both Texts and Calls. Better than others I had tried.

reviews.comment: Worked great till I did a software upgrade on my Evo. The phone portion of this app does not work with android 2.3

reviews.title: Fail on ICS
reviews.comment: Was a great app, but fails on Android 4.0.3 - voice very choppy & incomplete. Looking forward to an update!

reviews.title: Wonderful app
reviews.comment: One word: Perfect. Best thing is you can add suffix or prefix with the caller name or message sender. And if you don\'t want to have either just remove it. Love it.

reviews.comment: Love it. Five stars all day

reviews.comment: It worked for a few days. Then all of a sudden my phone started to make a beeping noise whenever i would place a call. It stopped once i uninstalled

reviews.comment: This is an awesome free app, you can add pre name and post name comments... ie you have a call from (your contacts) Mr. Smith

reviews.comment: App works great! Use it just for announcing the caller id without any prefix. Would be perfect if one could insert a small delay before announcing.

reviews.comment: Great app, neat idea, but it doesn\'t seem to obey silent / vibrate / ring only settings.

reviews.title: worked great
